metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5206 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Firejail before 0.9.44.4, when running on a Linux kernel before 4.8, allowscontext-dependent attackers to bypass a seccomp-based sandbox protectionmechanism via the --allow-debuggers argument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.44.8-1
firejail-profiles - 0.9.44.8-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: firejail package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.44.8-1').
